group_1.textCenter: They want you for the grand finale of@their upcoming fashion show.
It was practically a given they'd choose me,@considering how beautiful I am!
Right. I was really the only option!@Ah ha ha haaa!

group_1.textRight: Ria! Do you have any idea what time it is?!

group_1.textCenter: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?! S-sorry!
Anyway, that's enough of that. I really must@get my beauty sleep.
Fiiiiiinally, today's the day! The day of@the fashion show!
(My beauty will capture everyone's gaze.)
(I'm on my way to being a popular model,@taking offers from every magazine around!)
(And then, slowly but surely, I'll get to@have my global debut.)
(It's no longer just a dream!)
All right, let's give this all I've got!
[chara:301001:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...?!
Are you kidding?! A Witch?! Now?!
(Ugh, I can't just leave it here to run@rampant.)
I'll dispose of it quickly and with class!

group_1.textRight: No one is watching, but that's no excuse to@stumble around and fight sloppily.
My battles must always be at the peak of@elegance and beauty!
Seems like you beat me to this one.

group_1.textLeft: (Wow! She showed up right on time. Could@she be a fan of mine?!)
So be it! Please enjoy the show! Witness@my gorgeous battle technique!

group_1.textRight: Never mind. I better just beat this Witch@before I get caught up in somethin' stupid.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Pardon?! H-hey, wait a minute! Are you@ignoring me?!
More importantly, why are you trying to @steal the limelight?!

group_1.textRight: Uhhh, whatever it is you think you're doin',@it's got nothin' to do with me.
Just try an' keep outta my way, 'kay?

group_1.textLeft: What?! You're the one who's in the way!
I simply won't stand for this vile rudeness@in my presence!

group_1.textRight: Man... No idea what you're talkin' about.
Doesn't matter though. I'm happy to crush@this thing for ya!

group_1.textCenter: Argh. Well that felt like a massive waste@of time.
It's already going dark.
Wait, it's going dark...
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ohhhhhh noooooo!!!
The fashion show is already over?!
H-how could this happen?

group_1.narration: How could my fashion show end while I was@bickering with this girl?!

group_1.textCenter: This can't be happening!!!
Huh? It was a dream?
Ah, right! Of course it was!
As if I would ever make the mistake of being@late over something so trivial.
That's utterly unlike me!
No worries! The show will be a success!@Ah ha ha ha haaa!
